00023 #include <Frottement_interfacial_Wallis.h>
00024 #include <Pb_Multiphase.h>
00025 
00026 Implemente_instanciable(Frottement_interfacial_Wallis, "Frottement_interfacial_Wallis", Frottement_interfacial_base);
00027 
00028 Sortie& Frottement_interfacial_Wallis::printOn(Sortie& os) const
00029 {
00030   return os;
00031 }
00032 
00033 Entree& Frottement_interfacial_Wallis::readOn(Entree& is)
00034 {
00035   /* rien a lire pour l'instant */
00036   Param param(que_suis_je());
00037   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00038 
00039 // identification des phases
00040   const Pb_Multiphase *pbm = sub_type(Pb_Multiphase, pb_.valeur()) ? &ref_cast(Pb_Multiphase, pb_.valeur()) : NULL;
00041   if (!pbm || pbm->nb_phases() == 1) Process::exit(que_suis_je() + " : not needed for single-phase flow!");
00042   for (int n = 0; n < pbm->nb_phases(); n++) //recherche de n_l, n_g : phase {liquide,gaz}_continu en priorite
00043     if (pbm->nom_phase(n).debute_par("liquide") && (n_l < 0 || pbm->nom_phase(n).finit_par("continu")))  n_l = n;
00044     else if (pbm->nom_phase(n).debute_par("gaz") && (n_g < 0 || pbm->nom_phase(n).finit_par("continu"))) n_g = n;
00045 
00046   if (n_l < 0) Process::exit(que_suis_je() + " : liquid phase not found!");
00047   if (n_g < 0) Process::exit(que_suis_je() + " : gas phase not found!");
00048 
00049   return is;
00050 }
00051 
00052 void Frottement_interfacial_Wallis::coefficient(const DoubleTab& alpha, const DoubleTab& p, const DoubleTab& T,
00053                                                 const DoubleTab& rho, const DoubleTab& mu, double Dh,
00054                                                 const DoubleTab& ndv, DoubleTab& coeff) const
00055 {
00056   double A_i = 4 * sqrt(alpha(n_g)) / Dh, //aire interfaciale
00057          d_f = Dh / 2 * (1 - sqrt(alpha(n_g))), //epaisseur de film,
00058          Cf = 0.005 * (1 + 300 * d_f / Dh); //coeff de frottement
00059   coeff = 0;
00060   coeff(n_l, n_g, 1) = coeff(n_g, n_l, 1) = A_i * Cf * rho(n_g);
00061   coeff(n_l, n_g, 0) = coeff(n_g, n_l, 0) = coeff(n_l, n_g, 1) * ndv(n_l, n_g);
00062 }
